task: DBC Decode the concatenated MF4 file and Extract the bus signals. Export the decoded MF4 file to CSV after resampling with time step of 2s, Single time base and Time as date settings applied. (Parameters: input_folder=C:\Users\ADMIN\Downloads\ev-data-pack-v10\ev-data-pack-v10\electric_cars\log_files\Kia EV6\LOG\2F6913DB\00001045, output_folder=C:\Users\ADMIN\Downloads\ev-data-pack-v10\ev-data-pack-v10\electric_cars\log_files\Kia EV6\LOG\2F6913DB\00001045, input_concatenated_filename=Kia_EV_6_2F6913DB_00001045.MF4, input_CAN_database_file=C:\Users\ADMIN\Downloads\ev-data-pack-v10\ev-data-pack-v10\electric_cars\log_files\Kia EV6\can2-canmod-gnss.dbc, output_decoded_filename=Kia_EV_6_2F6913DB_00001045_decoded.mf4, output_csv_filename=Kia_EV_6_2F6913DB_00001045.csv)

plan.reasoning: Activate asammdf window so subsequent UI interactions target the correct application
Discover current UI elements and confirm we are in Single files view before opening the concatenated MF4
Open Mode menu to ensure Single files mode is selected (KB: can_lin_flexray_decoding recommends Mode be set to Single files before opening file)
Select Single files mode to enable Bus logging and Modify & Export tools (KB: can_lin_flexray_decoding)
Open File menu to load the concatenated MF4 file
Choose Open to bring up the file dialog for selecting the concatenated MF4
Capture the file open dialog elements so we can enter the concatenated filename
Enter the full path (placeholder) of the concatenated MF4 to open it
Wait for the file to open and UI to update
Discover UI elements now that the file is open and locate the Bus logging tab
Open the Bus logging tab to load the CAN database for decoding (KB: can_lin_flexray_decoding)
Initiate loading of the external CAN database (.dbc) required for DBC decoding (KB: can_lin_flexray_decoding; learning: the correct button is 'Load CAN database')
Capture the file dialog for selecting the CAN database file
Enter the path (placeholder) to the .dbc CAN database file to load it for decoding
Allow time for the CAN database to load
Extract bus signals using the loaded CAN database and create a decoded MF4 (learning: use 'Extract Bus Signals' rather than an 'Apply' button) (KB: can_lin_flexray_decoding)
Capture the Save dialog to enter the output decoded MF4 filename
Enter the full path (placeholder) and filename for the decoded MF4 output
Save the decoded MF4 file to the specified placeholder path (KB: can_lin_flexray_decoding)
Wait for the decoding and saving operation to complete (time depends on file size)
Confirm the decoded MF4 is available and discover Modify & Export controls
Open the Modify & Export tab to access resample and export tools (KB: file_modify_and_export_tools)
Select the Resample tool to set the desired time step for the measurement (KB: file_modify_and_export_tools)
Capture the Resample options UI so we can set the interval to 2 seconds
Set the resample interval to 2 seconds (placeholder value entered into the resample interval field) (KB: file_modify_and_export_tools)
Apply the resample operation to the opened (decoded) measurement (KB: file_modify_and_export_tools)
Allow time for the Resample operation to complete
Refresh UI state before starting the export to CSV and capture export formatting controls (learning: confirm format dropdown options with State-Tool)
Open the Output format dropdown to choose CSV for export (KB: file_modify_and_export_tools; learning: use State-Tool after opening dropdown to locate CSV option)
Capture dropdown options so we can reliably click the CSV option
Select CSV as the export format (KB: file_modify_and_export_tools)
Enable Single time base for the CSV export so the file uses a single time axis (KB: file_modify_and_export_tools)
Set Time as date so timestamps in the CSV are exported as date/time values (KB: file_modify_and_export_tools)
Apply the export formatting options prior to saving the CSV (learning: Apply before entering filename and clicking Save) (KB: file_modify_and_export_tools)
Capture the Save dialog for exporting the CSV so we can enter the output CSV filename
Enter the full path (placeholder) and filename for the exported CSV in the Save dialog (KB: file_modify_and_export_tools; learning: enter filename then click Save)
Save the resampled, decoded measurement to CSV at the specified placeholder path (KB: file_modify_and_export_tools)
Wait for the CSV export to complete; file size affects duration
Final capture of UI to confirm export finished and file dialogs closed

Overall strategy: ensure Single files mode, open the provided concatenated MF4, load the provided .dbc and use 'Extract Bus Signals' to produce a decoded MF4. Then use Modify & Export -> Resample to set a 2s interval, apply single time base and time-as-date options, and export to CSV. State-Tool calls are included before UI interactions and after opening dropdowns per KB learnings. Save/open dialogs use placeholder paths as required.

metadata.operation: DBC Decode the concatenated MF4 file and Extract the bus signals. Export the decoded MF4 file to CSV after resampling with time step of 2s, Single time base and Time as date settings applied.
